original_title: Biti u rodu s Johnom Malkovichem
overview: Luka MavretiÄ‡ investigates the family myth of kinship with John Malkovich. It is not just a harmless search for a famous cousin, but his way of finally reconnecting with his estranged family members, which he neglected for years, including his father.
title: Being Related to John Malkovich
